name: Emotic Move
description:
Emotic Move Nice game to pay


In this game you have to push the smile and smile starts moving. When it comes below you have to place the plate infront of the smile,otherwise it touches ground and one life decreases. User has 3 lives. There are objects placed that smile destroys when collides and your point increases. Some objects are moving up to down. When you collect those then different actions performed like plate increase,plate decrease, smile speed increase/decrease , 1 life to be added and smile color changed to red etc.There are 10 levels. when you complete one by one level then you face hard to break objects
